data.title: Software & Departmental Applications
data.meta_description: Before a new piece of software is introduced at ODU, ITS reviews it for compatibility and security. This is especially important if the software will collect personal data, use ITS systems and resources, or require ongoing maintenance by ITS. The software listed below has been reviewed for University use, and is currently being used by the noted departments. Please note there may be a cost associated with licensing a particular software title or application in your department.
